name: Luke Kornet
comment: Kornet (ankle) is questionable for Monday's game at Detroit.

name: Marcus Smart
comment: Smart (ankle) said Tuesday that he's without a clear timeline to return to game action and acknowledged the possibility that he could remain out through the All-Star break, Jay King of The Athletic reports.

name: Danilo Gallinari
comment: Gallinari (knee) said Sunday in an interview with Gianluca Bortolomai of AroundTheGame.com that his goal remains to return to game action at some point during the Celtics' postseason run.

name: Ben Simmons
comment: Simmons (knee) is questionable for Monday's matchup against the Clippers, Meghan Triplett of GrindCityMedia.com reports.

name: Seth Curry
comment: Curry has been ruled out for Monday's contest against the Clippers due to a left adductor strain, Meghan Triplett of GrindCityMedia.com reports.

name: T.J. Warren
comment: Warren (shin) is probable for Monday's contest against the Clippers, Meghan Triplett of GrindCityMedia.com reports.

name: Kevin Durant
comment: Durant (knee) is on track with his recovery plan and will be re-evaluated again in two weeks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Cody Martin
comment: Martin (knee) will sit again Sunday versus the Magic.

name: Kelly Oubre Jr.
comment: Oubre suggested Thursday that he expects to transition into a smaller brace to protect his surgically repaired left hand, Roderick Boone of The Charlotte Observer reports. He anticipates wearing the brace for 1-to-2 weeks. "And then right after [the 1-to-2-week period] we'll be at All-Star break," Oubre said. "And then that's, Godspeed, the plan to come back."

name: Alex Caruso
comment: Caruso (foot) is questionable for Monday's game against the Celtics.

name: Lonzo Ball
comment: Coach Billy Donovan said before Saturday's game against the Magic that Ball (knee) is "nowhere close" to returning and the team will have a formal conversation about a cut-off date if nothing improves by the All-Star break, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports.

name: Javonte Green
comment: Green (knee) is at least a week away from workouts that include running and jumping, Julia Poe of the Chicago Tribune reports. He remains without a timetable for a return.

name: Dylan Windler
comment: Head coach J.B. Bickerstaff said Monday that Windler (ankle) is making progress and expected to play at some point this season, but the forward remains out indefinitely, Evan Dammarell of FearTheSword.com reports.

name: Christian Wood
comment: Wood (thumb) is questionable for Monday's game against the Jazz.

name: Kyrie Irving
comment: Irving is expected to arrive for his physical in Dallas on Monday and make his Mavs' debut Wednesday against the Clippers, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Markieff Morris
comment: Morris has been traded to the Mavericks, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Davis Bertans
comment: Bertans (calf) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Luka Doncic
comment: Doncic (heel) has been ruled out of Monday's game against the Jazz, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Maxi Kleber
comment: Kleber (hamstring) will remain out for the Mavericks' upcoming five-game road trip but has been cleared for contact work, Callie Caplan of The Dallas Morning News reports.

name: Collin Gillespie
comment: Gillespie (lower leg) is out Tuesday against the Pelicans.

name: Isaiah Stewart
comment: Stewart is questionable for Monday's game against the Celtics due to left hip soreness.

name: Marvin Bagley III
comment: Bagley underwent surgery to repair a fracture of the third and fourth metacarpals in his right hand Thursday and will be re-evaluated in six weeks, NBA writer Marc Stein reports.

name: Cade Cunningham
comment: Cunningham (lower leg) underwent successful surgery Friday to stabilize and promote healing of his left tibial stress fracture, James L. Edwards III of The Athletic reports.

name: Andre Iguodala
comment: Iguodala (hip) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Thunder.

name: Stephen Curry
comment: An MRI taken on Curry's injured left knee revealed partial tears of his superior tibiofibular ligaments and interosseous membrane, as well as a lower left leg contusion, C.J. Holmes of the San Francisco Chronicle reports.

name: Garrison Mathews
comment: Mathews is questionable for Monday's game against the Kings due to left big toe soreness.

name: Kevin Porter Jr.
comment: Porter (foot/toe) said Tuesday that there's still no timetable for his return to game action, Michael Shapiro of SI.com reports.

name: John Wall
comment: Head coach Ty Lue relayed Tuesday that Wall (abdomen) remains without a specific target date to retake the floor, Andrew Greif of the Los Angeles Times reports.

name: Austin Reaves
comment: Reaves (hamstring) has been ruled out for Saturday's game against the Pelicans, Ryan Ward of LakersNation.com reports.

name: Steven Adams
comment: Adams has been diagnosed with a PCL sprain in his right knee and is expected to miss the next 3-to-5 weeks.

name: Victor Oladipo
comment: Oladipo (ankle) is out for Saturday's game against the Bucks.

name: Duncan Robinson
comment: Robinson (finger) has been ruled out for Saturday's matchup against the Bucks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Orlando Robinson
comment: Robinson is expected to miss several weeks after he sustained as fractured right thumb in Tuesday's 100-97 win over the Cavaliers, but the Heat haven't yet provided an official timeline for his return, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Omer Yurtseven
comment: Yurtseven's left ankle has fully healed from surgery, and he's been cleared for high-impact work, Barry Jackson of the Miami Herald reports.

name: Nikola Jovic
comment: Jovic (back) will miss another four weeks, Ira Winderman of the South Florida Sun Sentinel reports.

name: Giannis Antetokounmpo
comment: Antetokounmpo (knee) is probable for Monday's game against the Trail Blazers.

name: Bobby Portis
comment: Portis (knee) is expected to miss at least two weeks, Adrian Wojnarowski of ESPN reports.

name: Serge Ibaka
comment: Ibaka (personal) and the Bucks mutually agreed Friday to begin pursuing trade opportunities, Shams Charania of The Athletic reports.

name: Kyle Anderson
comment: Anderson has been ruled out for the remainder of Sunday's game against the Nuggets due to back spasms.

name: Austin Rivers
comment: Rivers has received a three-game suspension for his actions in the scuffle during Friday's game against the Magic, Jason Anderson of The Sacramento Bee reports.

name: Karl-Anthony Towns
comment: Timberwolves general manager Tim Connelly relayed Tuesday that Towns (calf) remains sidelined indefinitely, Dane Moore of 'The Dane Moore NBA Podcast' reports.

name: Dyson Daniels
comment: Daniels (ankle) has been ruled out for Sunday's matchup against the Kings, Jim Eichenhofer of the Pelicans' official site reports.

name: Zion Williamson
comment: Williamson (hamstring) will be re-evaluated in two weeks.

name: E.J. Liddell
comment: Liddell (knee) signed a two-way contract with the Pelicans on Sunday.

name: RJ Barrett
comment: Barrett is doubtful for Sunday's game against the 76ers due to an illness.

name: Mitchell Robinson
comment: Knicks team owner James Dolan said Thursday in his appearance on the "Good Day New York" program that Robinson (thumb) will be sidelined for four more weeks, Steve Popper of Newsday reports.

name: Jeremiah Robinson-Earl
comment: Robinson-Earl (ankle) remains on assignment with the G League's Oklahoma City Blue and won't play in Monday's matchup against the Warriors.

name: Luguentz Dort
comment: Dort (hamstring) will remain on the sidelines for Monday's game against the Warriors.

name: Aleksej Pokusevski
comment: Pokusevski sustained a non-displaced tibial plateau fracture in his left leg Tuesday's game against the Thunder and will be re-evaluated in six to eight weeks, Nick Crain of Forbes.com reports.

name: Chet Holmgren
comment: Holmgren (foot) underwent a successful secondary procedure Tuesday to remove hardware from his initial Lisfranc surgery in August, Michael Scotto of USA Today reports.

name: Chuma Okeke
comment: Okeke (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the 76ers.

name: Cameron Payne
comment: The Suns announced Friday that Payne (foot) will be re-evaluated in a week, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Devin Booker
comment: Booker (groin) has been ramping up his on-court work and could return to the floor as soon as Tuesday's game against the Nets, source reports.

name: Landry Shamet
comment: Shamet (foot) won't play Monday against the Raptors and is out indefinitely, Duane Rankin of The Arizona Republic reports.

name: Jae Crowder
comment: Crowder, who has been away from the Suns all season while the team explores avenues to trade him, has been working out daily in Atlanta in order to stay ready for his next opportunity to play, Chris Haynes of BleacherReport.com reports.

name: Justise Winslow
comment: Winslow (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's game against Milwaukee.

name: Ibou Badji
comment: Badji (knee) has been ruled out for Monday's game against the Bucks.

name: Gary Payton II
comment: Payton (illness) is probable for Monday's game against the Bucks.

name: Jusuf Nurkic
comment: Nurkic is in line to be sidelined through the All-Star break after an MRI on Thursday revealed a left calf strain.

name: Romeo Langford
comment: Langford (hip) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Bulls, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Tre Jones
comment: Jones (foot) is questionable for Monday's game against the Bulls, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Keldon Johnson
comment: Johnson is questionable for Monday's game against Chicago due to left ankle soreness, Paul Garcia of ProjectSpurs.com reports.

name: Devin Vassell
comment: Vassell (knee) was spotted Tuesday doing some walking on a treadmill, Tom Osborn of the San Antonio Express-News reports.

name: O.G. Anunoby
comment: Anunoby (wrist) will be held out for the rest of Toronto's road trip, which lasts until Sunday against Memphis, Kayla Grey of TSN reports.

name: Otto Porter Jr.
comment: The Raptors announced Tuesday that Porter underwent season-ending surgery on his left foot, Marc J. Spears of ESPN.com reports.

name: Jarred Vanderbilt
comment: Vanderbilt (back) is questionable to play Monday against the Mavs, Tony Jones of The Athletic reports.

name: Bradley Beal
comment: Beal (foot) is being listed as questionable for Monday's matchup with the Cavs.

name: Anthony Gill
comment: Gill (COVID-19 protocols) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against Cleveland.

name: Kyle Kuzma
comment: Kuzma (ankle) has been ruled out for Monday's matchup against the Cavaliers.
